author: ryanleeschneider
content: could be interesting, I'd assume us normies not running goerli validators w/ the change would just stay on the minority chain?

author: ajsutton
content: You'd only demonstrate the worst case impact if it winds up being the valid chain that's clearly accepted. If the majority of services just follow the invalid chain you just set the expectation that majority wins regardless.  And if the chain just dies I don't think anyone learns anything because the chain was going to die anyway.
